description: The main entry point and root widget definitions for a Flutter-based healthcare management application. It initializes the app, sets up themes, navigation, and displays core screens such as dashboard, consultations, records, and profile with adaptive layout for different screen sizes.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget that provides the app's theme and navigation.

classes.name: RootScaffold
classes.description: Stateless widget that manages the main layout, including side navigation or bottom navigation, and switches between core screens based on navigation state.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the root MyApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp with themes and the root scaffold for the app.
